Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: sarah taylor
Reviews.Content: A SIMPLE CAMERA AS A GIFT FOR MY MOM FOR HER TO GET INTO DIGITAL THIS IS A BEGINER CAMERA FOR HER AND SHE ENJOYS IT..THANKS

Reviews.Title: Polaroid used to make good products but not this!!
Reviews.Author: Tia D.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera around 4 or 5 years ago (in Dark Blue though not green) and have NOT been happy with it since day one. It takes 2 AA batteries which only last a good maybe 10-20 mins or for about 6 pictures! I usEd this at my kids graduations and had to keep putting batteries in it the whole time and should I mention the pics it takes are not good no matter what settings you use. I managed to get a few good pics out of this camera but I am always saying how much I hate this camera...don't make the same mistake I did, you'll miss out on alot of memories if you buy this. I hope they stopped making this one. TWO THUMBS DOWN!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera 5 years ago, It still takes amazing photos. I love the fact of the material it's made of. It's not metal its almost a cloth feel. Very nice. Easy grip to it and if it gets dirty just take a damp cloth or a baby wipe and wipe one boom dirt is gone. I have always wanted a great working camera and one that fit my personality. THIS IS IT!! 5 years running and still a huge hit. LOVE IT. I would defiantly buy this camera again if mine ever broke. :D

ProductInfo.Features:
Polaroid i835 8 MP 3x Optical/4x Digital Zoom Camera General Features: Green design
1/2.5-inch CCD sensor 8.0 megapixel resolution 3x optical zoom 4x digital zoom 3.0-inch LCD
JPEG (EXIF 2.2), DCF, DPOF, AVI image compression AVI video format PictBridge compatible
32 MB built-in storage SD compatible for expanded memory (up to 4 GB, not included) USB interface
1/1000 second - 1 second shutter speed
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid i835 8MP 3x Optical/4x Digital Zoom Camera (Green)
